titles.title: To extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on Cyhalofop.
To extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on Cyhalofop.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to increase, through December 31, 2011, the duty on Propanoic acid, 2-[4-(cyano-2-fluorophenoxy)phenoxy]-butyl ester (2R) (Cyhalofop).
